location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to the Resident or Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to the Resident or Acting Resident at Bushire, enclosing a packet containing information on the war declared by Sweden against England on 18 October 1810 (not included) and requesting this to be quickly and safely forwarded to India, authorising to pay up to 1500 rupees to accelerate the departure of any merchant ship from Bushire.
